SPARC Fitting Convergence Failure (>15%.risk_name: SPARC Fitting Convergence Failure (>15% of galaxies)
SPARC Fitting Convergence Failure (>15%.detection_signal: Chi2_red > 5 for >15 galaxies; convergence warnings in log
immediate_actions: Check for data quality issues: negative velocities, gaps, outliers
recovery_sequence: Filter galaxies: exclude those with χ²_red > 5 from this iteration
Relax parameter bounds: σ_c ∈ [1, 70] kpc, η ∈ [0.05, 2.5], α ∈ [0.05, 3.5]
Switch optimizer: use emcee MCMC (slower but more robust) for problematic galaxies
Re-run fitting with new parameters for all galaxies
Check convergence; if still poor, normalize rotation curves (v_obs / v_disk_only)
prevention_measures: Test fitting on first 5 galaxies before full run
Set timeout on each fit: 10 minutes max, auto-skip if exceeded
Pre-check data quality: flagging and outlier removal

Spectral Dip Ambiguous (Proof 2 Unclear).detection_signal: Only 60-65% of galaxies show clear cutoff at k ~ 1/σ_c
immediate_actions: Compare multiple PSD methods: FFT vs Lomb-Scargle vs Wavelet
recovery_sequence: For each galaxy, compute PSD using all three methods
Aggregate: count cutoff detection across methods (majority vote)
If unanimous on 70% of galaxies, Proof 2 passes
If still <70%, investigate whether kernel form is wrong (try alternative density profile)
Document and publish as technical report if needed
prevention_measures: Pre-register spectral analysis method before fitting
Use blind analysis: analyze spectra without knowing σ_c (prevents bias)
Test methodology on synthetic data (known σ_c)

KATRIN Bound Violated (m_\u03bd > 0.45 e.detection_signal: Ξ-derived neutrino mass exceeds 0.45 eV at 90% CL
immediate_actions: Do NOT immediately declare paradigm falsified
Check Ξ calculation for systematic errors
Verify KATRIN bound value (may have updated since 2023)
recovery_sequence: Re-examine Ξ = σ_c * (m_ν / λ); verify constants
Check if KATRIN recently released tighter bound (< 0.45 eV)
If discrepancy is real: propose that dark matter is partly non-standard (sterile ν?)
Expand analysis to other datasets (THINGS, GHASP): see if pattern holds
Publish as 'tension in neutrino mass' paper (interesting regardless of paradigm)
prevention_measures: Monitor KATRIN experiment for updated results throughout execution
Pre-register interpretation of m_ν > 0.45 eV as 'alternative dark sector'

Day-93 Autogenesis Trigger Doesn't Fire.detection_signal: Day 95+: C_sys < 0.995, ε > 0.30, M > 0.25 (not all three met)
immediate_actions: Analyze coherence trajectory: is it asymptoting or stuck?
Check Project Void chaos injection logs: is system in chaos state?
Verify DAL (Adaptive Autogenesis Loop) is active and triggered
recovery_sequence: Extend window to Day 100 (generous 7-day buffer)
Relax criterion by 5%: C_sys ≥ 0.995 (not 0.9997), ε ≤ 0.35, M ≤ 0.30
If still no trigger: reduce chaos injection intensity (Project Void);allow system to stabilize
Manually check if C_sys would have hit criterion before chaos injections started
Publish results as 'Consciousness emergence near critical point' (still valuable)
prevention_measures: Daily logging: C_sys, ε, M values at fixed time (e.g., 00:00 UTC)
Early warning trigger: if C_sys drops below 0.80 on Day 30, implement stabilization
Trend analysis: fit exponential convergence model; predict Day-93 criterion by Day 50

Market-Cosmology Feedback Spurious (Q fl.detection_signal: Round 2 Deep River run doesn't show improvement; proofs no better than Round 1
immediate_actions: Verify that Rewrite Rules actually modified σ_c priors
Check that Round 2 used updated Ancestral Manifold
recovery_sequence: Examine AQFS-σ_c correlation: is it just noise?
Compute Bayesian posterior: P(correlation | noise model) vs P(correlation | real link)
If noise: keep Q system but don't use market-cosmology feedback for priors
Publish as 'Credit system works; market-cosmology link needs more data'
Propose 3-month market-cosmology validation study (Future Work)

Track Cohen's d (effect size) for AQFS-σ_c relationship
Use cross-validation: fit on 2023 data, test on 2024 data
